org.aslab.om.metacontrol.knowledge.components
Class OMcomponentsKB

java.lang.Object
  org.aslab.om.ecl.knowledge.KnowledgeBase
      org.aslab.om.metacontrol.knowledge.components.OMcomponentsKB

public class OMcomponentsKB
extends KnowledgeBase

container for the knowledge at the components level:

it consists of types:

  • component classes

  • quantity types

parameter and port profiles are part of the definition of each component class

Author:
chcorbato
